title: My Eid al-Fitr
description: Eid al-Fitr is a holiday observed by many Muslims at the end of Ramadan. In My Eid al-Fitr, a friendly young girl helps Shadi, her new neighbor, feel more at home by sharing her Eid al-Fitr gifts with him and inviting him to go to the Eid fair with her family. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify main idea and details and the proper use of homophones.
